tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NNP Life)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (RB so) (RB unbelievably) (JJ short)))) (: -) (S (NP (NP (JJS most)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP us)))) (VP (VBP do) (RB n't) (ADVP (RB even)) (VP (VB realise) (NP (PRP it))))) (. !)))
